note.p: Death: Hanover, New Hampshire, USA (11 February 1978)
Research Field: Organic chemistry, science policy
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1979 vol 25 pp 209-232, plate, by G B Kistiakowsky and F H Westheimer
References: D C Martin, 'Visit by the Assistant Secretary to some North American Scientific Institutions' in NR 1952 vol 9 pp 356-364
W van der Kloot, 'April 1915: Five Future Nobel Prize-Winners Inaugurate Weapons Of Mass Destruction And The Academic-Industrial-Military Complex' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 149-160
J S Rowlinson, 'The war time work of Hinshelwood and his colleagues' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 161-175
